description:
Now compatible with webOS 2.x

How many contacts do you use daily? 15? 20? How many contacts do you have in your phone? 150? 200? 500? It would be wonderful to have your frequent contacts a couple of taps away, right? Imagine this: tap on your launch bar, tap on your friend, and you're connected to him. Fast, easy, amazing. That's Communicate Dialer. Communicate Dialer is the new way you keep you in touch with your people. Create groups, customize them, and add contacts to each group. Move easily between groups, and keep all the contact methods near your finger everywhere, everyday. Not convinced? Watch the introductory video, you'll be... Try Communicate Dialer Demo, replace your Phone icon in your launch bar with Communicate, and you'll love it. Communicate: there is no easier, faster and elegant way to keep you connected to your people.

Lite Version limited to up to 2 groups & 4 contacts each group.

v. 1.1.0: Added webOS 2.x compatibility.
